Message:
After awakening
my latent magical powers,
reducing the laboratory to rubble
was a simple feat.

I subjected every researcher
scurrying for their lives
to the same “experiments” I was.

Soon, every wriggling worm
was left limp and lifeless.

Such fragile and foolish creatures.
To think I was created
to kill these things.

Well, no matter.
I’d be damned to live out
the rest of my life as a weapon.

Besides, I had more important
things to do.

Fragments of an untamed Curse
are stirring within me.
Through that very Curse,
I can feel it.

My one and only family.
Stronger than any blood bond,
it’s the Curse that connects
me to her.
I’m coming to see you now.
